Package com.nrg948.preferences

Class ProfiledPIDControllerPreference

java.lang.Object
com.nrg948.preferences.PreferenceValue
com.nrg948.preferences.ProfiledPIDControllerPreference
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sendable
public class ProfiledPIDControllerPreference extends PreferenceValue implements Sendable
Manages a ProfiledPIDController whose gains are stored in WPILib Preferences. This class provides a preference-backed wrapper around a Profiled PID controller so that kP, kI, and kD can be tuned at runtime without recompiling code.

The internal ProfiledPIDController instance is configured using the stored preference values, allowing this class to be used anywhere a regular ProfiledPIDController would be used, while automatically persisting and retrieving gains from the robot preferences. In addition, it implements Sendable so that its parameters can be exposed to dashboards and other tools.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ProfiledPIDControllerPreference

      public ProfiledPIDControllerPreference(String group, String name, double defaultP, double defaultI, double defaultD, TrapezoidProfile.Constraints constraints)
      Creates a new ProfiledPIDControllerPreference with the given group, name, default PID gains, and motion profile constraints. Uses a default period of 0.02 seconds.
      Parameters:
      group - The preference group.
      name - The preference name.
      defaultP - The default P gain.
      defaultI - The default I gain.
      defaultD - The default D gain.
      constraints - The motion profile constraints.

    • ProfiledPIDControllerPreference

      public ProfiledPIDControllerPreference(String group, String name, double defaultP, double defaultI, double defaultD, TrapezoidProfile.Constraints constraints, double period)
      Creates a new ProfiledPIDControllerPreference with the given group, name, default PID gains, motion profile constraints, and period.
      Parameters:
      group - The preference group.
      name - The preference name.
      defaultP - The default P gain.
      defaultI - The default I gain.
      defaultD - The default D gain.
      constraints - The motion profile constraints.
      period - The period for this controller.
